scripts.package: npm run build && node -e "const v=require('./package.json').version; const n=`obsidian-ttrpg-soundboard-${v}.zip`; require('child_process').execSync(`npx bestzip ${n} manifest.json main.js styles.css versions.json LICENSE README.md`, {stdio:'inherit'})"
scripts.sync-manifest-version: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const m=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('manifest.json','utf8')); const p=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json','utf8')); if(m.version!==p.version){m.version=p.version; fs.writeFileSync('manifest.json', JSON.stringify(m,null,2)); console.log('Synced manifest version to', p.version);} else {console.log('Versions already match');}"
